Package org.simplity.kernel.db

classes that deal with rdbms on top of jdbc

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DbClientInterface
    Interface to be implemented by a class that wants to work with RdbDriver.
    RowIterator
    Way to iterate over each resultant row of a SQL.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractParameterHandler
    an interface that defines all advanced, driver specific functionalities of stored procedure parameter.
    DbDriver
    We use DbDriver as a wrapper on JDBC to restrict the features to a smaller subset that is easy to maintain.
    ProcedureParameter
    parameter used in a prepared statement or stored procedure
    SchemaDetail  
    Sql
    A prepared statement with which to interacts with the data base.
    SqlParameter
    parameter used in a prepared statement or stored procedure
    StoredProcedure
    A stored procedure that can be invoked from app layer.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DbAccessType
    defines the type of database access required for a service
    DbVendor
    RDBMS vendors that we can use.
    InOutType  
    SqlType  

Package org.simplity.kernel.db Description
